document.full_text: frank mccourt, the dodgers' owner, called commissioner bud selig's decision to take control of his team an unfair, un-american seizure of his property.
document.title: mccourt criticizes takeover of dodgers
lines_and_colors: frank mccourt, the dodgers' owner, called commissioner bud selig's decision to take control of his team an unfair, un-american seizure of his property.
